titleStmt.title: An appendix to the answer unto two Athenian Mercuries concerning pedo-baptism containing twenty seven syllogistical arguments proving infant-baptism a mere humane tradition : the gentlmen called the Athenian Society desiring in the last of the said Mercuries to have syllogism / by B. K.
titleStmt.author: Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author and sold by John Harris ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Benjamin Keach. Cf. Halkett & Laing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
